id:
Crunchyroll




Catherine: Full Body Video Samples All 11 Ideal Voice Set Actors
Recommended Article
paragraph:
Catherine: Full Body's Japanese limited edition comes with the Ideal Voice Set DLC, which will also be available separately later. The set lets you choose from 11 voice actors in the role of Catherine, and we previously covered each option as they were revealed. In addition to the original, Miyuki Sawashiro, Ideal Voice set options include Nana Mizuki, Rina Satou, Rie Kugimiya, Megumi Toyoguchi, Haruka Tomatsu, Kana Asumi, Yui Horie, Ami Koshimizu, Aoi Yuuki, and Mamiko Noto. Now you can hear all 11 in one short video, which includes some very Catherine imagery, so be careful where you watch it…  Catherine: Full Body hits PS4 and PS Vita in Japan on February 14, 2019, with a western release to follow at some point.   -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine. You can read his webcomic, BIG DUMB FIGHTING IDIOTS at subhumanzoids. Follow him on Twitter @Moldilox.
